016package org.lifstools.jmzqc;
017
018import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.*;
019import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.type.*;
020import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.*;
021import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.annotation.*;
022import java.io.IOException;
023import java.util.Collections;
024import java.util.List;
025
026/**
027 * One or more controlled vocabulary elements describing the unit of the metric.
028 */
029@JsonDeserialize(using = Unit.Deserializer.class)
030        @JsonSerialize(using = Unit.Serializer.class)
031        public record Unit(
032        CvParameter cvParameterValue,
033        List<CvParameter> cvParameterArrayValue) {
034
035    public Unit  {
036        if (cvParameterArrayValue == null) {
037            cvParameterArrayValue = Collections.emptyList();
038        }
039    }
040
041    static class Deserializer extends JsonDeserializer<Unit> {
042
043        @Override
044        public Unit deserialize(JsonParser jsonParser, DeserializationContext deserializationContext) throws IOException, JsonProcessingException {
045            switch (jsonParser.currentToken()) {
046                case START_ARRAY -> {
047                    return new Unit(null, jsonParser.readValueAs(new TypeReference<List<CvParameter>>() {
048                    }));
049                }
050                case START_OBJECT -> {
051                    return new Unit(jsonParser.readValueAs(CvParameter.class), null);
052                }
053                default ->
054                    throw new IOException("Cannot deserialize Unit");
055            }
056        }
057    }
058
059    static class Serializer extends JsonSerializer<Unit> {
060
061        @Override
062        public void serialize(Unit obj, JsonGenerator jsonGenerator, SerializerProvider serializerProvider) throws IOException {
063            if (obj.cvParameterValue != null) {
064                jsonGenerator.writeObject(obj.cvParameterValue);
065                return;
066            }
067            if (obj.cvParameterArrayValue != null) {
068                jsonGenerator.writeObject(obj.cvParameterArrayValue);
069                return;
070            }
071            jsonGenerator.writeNull();
072        }
073    }
074}
